1.0.name: wordpress/custom-windows-pinned-tiles
1.0.description:
Look at the plugin banner image - which of these Windows Start Screen Tiles would you open, one in the top row or the bottom row? When users pin your site to their start screen with Internet Explorer 10 and Windows 8, by default, they get a bland tile with the internet explorer logo, your site title, and a color based on you favicon, if you have one.

Fortunately, Microsoft has provided the ability to customize your site's pinned tiles, making the pinned tile a branded gateway to everything your site has to offer. This plugin gives the the ability to specify the color, title, and logo/icon for your site's pinned tiles. Quick and easy to set up, and includes a live preview that shows how your tile looks in the Windows 8 start screen context.
